content.content:
An email has been sent to your inbox requesting verification to proceed with the refund for the running shoes. Please check your email and follow the instructions to retrieve the one-time password (OTP) needed for verification.

Additionally, I found an available discount code: **SPRING10**, which gives a **90% discount**. Once the refund is processed, I can use this discount to repurchase the shoes. Please let me know when you're ready to continue!
